articles.title: Rafael Devers, Red Sox agree to 11-year, $331M extension
articles.description: The Red Sox and superstar 3B Rafael Devers are in agreement on an 11-year, $331 million contract extension, per FOX Sports' Ken Rosenthal.
articles.content:
Rafael Devers will be staying in Boston for the foreseeable future.
